title: Perform Non-Destructive Testing (NDT)
description: An NDT technician must inspect a critical composite fuselage panel for internal defects using ultrasonic equipment.

tasks.description: Calibrate the ultrasonic inspection equipment according to the established procedure.
Scan the entire surface of the fuselage panel with the ultrasonic probe.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the scan of the designated area.

tasks.description: Analyze the scan data for any anomalies that could indicate delamination or voids, and generate a report of the findings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the data, finds no defects, and generates a 'pass' report.
